alert.note: Alert for Corson; Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:07PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Corson and northwestern Dewey Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 707 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Little Moreau Rec Area, or 9 miles southwest of Timber Lake, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Little Moreau Rec Area around 720 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Timber Lake and Glencross. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
